channel.title: When Fish Used On Range It Cooks All But On Fire Just One?
channel.description: When I use raw fish on a range, it cooks all with just one sequence; but with fire (like in Rogue's Den) it cooks it but only does it once, so you have to keep doing the sequence over. How do I make it so it cooks all? (Not simultaneously but 1 at a time without having to click again)

item.title: When Fish Used On Range It Cooks All But On Fire Just One?
item.dc:creator: @Impious_Lols Impious Lols
